likelihood_impact_change.explanation: The scenario predicts a 2.5°C temperature increase, which would likely exacerbate the frequency and severity of extreme weather events. This could lead to increased risks in supply chain disruptions and operational challenges for Apple’s iPhone Hardware manufacturing.

emerging_opportunities.description: As climate risks increase, there is an opportunity to innovate in sustainable materials and processes for iPhone hardware.
Developing iPhone hardware with better durability and environmental resilience can attract environmentally conscious consumers.

additional_challenges.description: Increased extreme weather events can disrupt the supply chain, affecting the availability of components and materials.
Manufacturing facilities could face shutdowns or delays due to extreme weather, impacting production schedules.

mitigation_strategies.description: Expand the supplier base to include regions less prone to extreme weather, reducing dependency on any single location.
Upgrade manufacturing and logistics facilities to withstand extreme weather conditions.
Utilize technology to monitor and predict weather patterns affecting supply chains, enabling proactive measures.
